alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:17PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and north central Deschutes Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 116 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tumalo, or 9 miles west of Redmond, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bend, Redmond, Sisters and Tumalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
